verses.verse: A Psalm of David. The <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s, and the <S%H4393>fulness<s%> <S%H8398>thereof<s%>; The world, and they that dwell <S%H3427>therein<s%>.
For he hath <S%H3245>founded<s%> it upon the <S%H3220>seas<s%>, And <S%H3559>established<s%> it upon the <S%H5104>floods<s%>.
Who shall <S%H5927>ascend<s%> into the <S%H2022>hill<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>? And who shall <S%H6965>stand<s%> in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>?

He that hath <S%H5355>clean<s%> <S%H3709>hands<s%>, and a <S%H1249>pure<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%>; Who hath not lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> unto <S%H7723>falsehood<s%>, And hath not <S%H7650>sworn<s%> <S%H4820>deceitfully<s%>.
He shall <S%H5375>receive<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, And <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> from the <S%H430>God<s%> of his <S%H3468>salvation<s%>.
This is the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of them that <S%H1875>seek<s%> after <S%H1245>him<s%>, That seek thy <S%H6440>face<s%>, even <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H7218>heads<s%>, O ye <S%H8179>gates<s%>; And be ye lifted <S%H5375>up<s%>, ye <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H6607>doors<s%>: And the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3519>glory<s%> will come <S%H935>in<s%>.
Who is the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3519>glory<s%>? <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5808>strong<s%> and <S%H5808>mighty<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5808>mighty<s%> in <S%H4421>battle<s%>.

Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H7218>heads<s%>, O ye <S%H8179>gates<s%>; <S%H5375>Yea<s%>, lift them up, ye <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H6607>doors<s%>: And the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3519>glory<s%> will come <S%H935>in<s%>.
Who is this <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3519>glory<s%>? <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, He is the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3519>glory<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
